title: King's Lynn
summary: King's Lynn, known until 1537 as Bishop's Lynn and colloquially as Lynn,[2] is a port and market town in Norfolk, England, 98 miles (158 km) north of London, 36 miles (58 km) north-east of Peterborough, 44 miles (71 km) north-north-east of Cambridge and 44 miles (71 km) west of Norwich.[2] The population is 42,800.[1]
